TIMER.TITLE: Get Ready for the Event!
TIMER.ALERT: The INCA CUP 2025 event has started!!!

ABOUT.TITLE: We are INCA CUP 2026
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: INCA CUP 2026 is about to begin! The tournament that will bring together the best players from Argentina and Latin America, along with elite special guests. Prove you are the best in the most competitive games, win exclusive prizes, and claim the glory. Are you ready to represent your region? Sign up and become part of the legend!

FORM.SEO_DESCRIPTION: Contact form for the INCA CUP 2026 tournament

MAP.SEO_DESCRIPTION: Location of the INCA CUP 2026 tournament

LOCATION.TITLE: Find Us Here!
LOCATION.SUB_TITLE: Get ready for action. This is the place where the excitement of the INCA CUP 2026 gaming event will unfold.
LOCATION.INTERACT_DESCRIPTION: Click on the map to interact or view on Google Maps.
LOCATION.GOOGLES_MAP: Click on the map to interact or view on Google Maps.

LIST.TITLE: Location between Lópes y Planes and H. Yrigoyen streets, ZIP code 4530.

CATEGORIES.SEO_DESCRIPTION: Categories of the INCA CUP 2026 tournament

CARD_1.TITLE: Fighting Games
CARD_1.DESCRIPTION: Games where players fight using skills and moves.

CARD_2.TITLE: MOBAs
CARD_2.DESCRIPTION: Mobas action and real-time strategy games for 1 to 5 players.

CARD_3.TITLE: Football Games
CARD_3.DESCRIPTION: Play and compete in 11-player football matches.

CARD_4.TITLE: Specials / Extras
CARD_4.DESCRIPTION: Cosplay of favorite video game and anime characters.

CARD_5.TITLE: General Competitives
CARD_5.DESCRIPTION: Streamer, teams, best player, strategic player.

CARD_6.TITLE: Fun / Humorous
CARD_6.DESCRIPTION: Category of fun and humorous games for everyone.

CARD_7.TITLE: Visuals / Setting
CARD_7.DESCRIPTION: Gamer style, accessories, decoration, and photography.

CARD_8.TITLE: Thematic / Dynamic
CARD_8.DESCRIPTION: Dance, music, cultural questions, and much more.
